summary: No blocking issues detected for the current marker window. One non-blocking process issue was observed and already mitigated (stale-marker CI auditor launch due uncommitted marker/failures artifacts).

issues.root_cause: The CI auditor subagent was launched before the refreshed marker/failures artifacts were committed, so the throwaway sandbox resolved the previous committed marker instead of the newly generated marker.
issues.mitigation: Refresh marker and failures on current HEAD, commit/push those artifacts first, then rerun the CI auditor against the committed state.
issues.prevention: Add/enable a pre-launch guard in subagent orchestration that refuses CI auditor launch when the active marker/failures files are uncommitted or when marker timestamp does not match the intended audit context.
issues.evidence: Post-marker progress entry explicitly records stale-context behavior and cleanup in docs/branches/feature-process-runtime-reorg/PROGRESS.md:1074, docs/branches/feature-process-runtime-reorg/PROGRESS.md:1078, docs/branches/feature-process-runtime-reorg/PROGRESS.md:1080; stale run output shows prior marker timestamp 2026-02-07T18:09:20.943539+00:00 in /tmp/ci-audit-20260207-185934.log:32975 and /tmp/ci-audit-20260207-185934.log:33003; refreshed marker/failures are aligned and failure-free at docs/parallelus/self-improvement/markers/feature-process-runtime-reorg.json:2, docs/parallelus/self-improvement/failures/feature-process-runtime-reorg--2026-02-07T18:59:20.559220+00:00.json:3, docs/parallelus/self-improvement/failures/feature-process-runtime-reorg--2026-02-07T18:59:20.559220+00:00.json:44.

follow_ups: Enforce CI-auditor launcher preflight to require committed marker/failures artifacts for the active branch before sandbox creation.
Persist this marker-matched auditor JSON report under docs/parallelus/self-improvement/reports/feature-process-runtime-reorg--2026-02-07T18:59:20.559220+00:00.json.
